name: Dunniette
description: Let's start the weekend right--with a cocktail recipe from Paul Clarke (The Cocktail Chronicles). Need more than one? Hit up the archives. Cheers! With a few isolated exceptions across the country--grab a sweater, Minneapolis and San Francisco--it's pretty warm out...
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 ounces gin (a classic London dry like Tanqueray or Beefeater work well)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake well for 10 seconds and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a bit of lemon peel.
